name: Snowburbian League
description:
A cozy soccer game set in a snowy suburban neighborhood during the warm holiday season!

Game Notes:

  • Automatic player switching in where you take control of the closest player to the ball
  • "Precise" passing to teammates and shooting on target where instead of button smashing, the game picks out the best and safer option for you
  • Controls (can also be found in the Options menu in-game)
    • WASD -- Move/Dribble/Chase
    • Space -- Pass
    • Left Mouse Click -- Shoot
    • Escape -- Pause/Exit
